snippet.title: Life of Delta Reveal Trailer - Future Games Show Spring Showcase
snippet.description:
Embark on a journey through a vast post-apocalyptic environment, full of interesting characters and engaging puzzle games in this sci-fi point-and-click adventure game.
 
Brought to you by Airo Games, if you like adventure games like Deponia then this might be right up your street.

#LifeOfDelta
